metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35493 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw exists in binutils in bfd/pef.c. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted PEF file to be parsed by objdump could cause a heap buffer overflow -> out-of-bounds read that could lead to an impact to application availability. This flaw affects binutils versions prior to 2.34.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> pef.c isn't compiled in Ubuntu package

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.35.50.20201210-0ubuntu2').
